help.schedule_desc: This tab displays the full plan of events, including their times and venues. Each event's location is a clickable link that will show you exactly where it is on the interactive map, helping you navigate the campus easily.
help.map_desc: Use the interactive map to explore the campus. The 'Locations' button at the top provides quick shortcuts to important spots. Tap any pin to see a brief description, then tap 'Learn More' for full details. The red circle shows your current location to help you navigate.
help.location_desc: After clicking 'Learn More' from the campus map, you can read a detailed description of this location. To gain an entry to the lucky draw, tap the camera icon in the bottom right to scan the QR code placed at this tour stop.

1.title: Welcome to uOttawa Explorer ðŸ‘‹
1.body: Welcome! This is the Schedule page, your hub for all upcoming events. Here you can easily find what's happening, along with their scheduled times and locations.

2.title: Explore the Map
2.body: Next, click the 'Campus Map' button in the navigation bar. This is where you'll find the interactive map to explore our beautiful campus.

3.title: Using the Interactive Map
3.body: This is the interactive map! Click on any pin to view a location, learn more about it, or use the dropdown menu to navigate directly. Track your tour progress with the bar at the top. The red circle shows your current location!

4.title: More Options & Help
4.body: Click 'More' in the navbar to change the language, find quick links to important resources, and get additional help if you need it. Enjoy your tour!
